content: crochet the cutest and coziest bed for your favorite feline friend or your small doggo you ll love this quick and easy pattern and your cat will love or possibly hate you know how cats are a new cozy sleeping place please note that this pattern is available for free on stitching-together com 1 the benefit of purchasing this pdf is an easy to read printable and ad-free version of the pattern 1 https //www stitching-together com/crochet-cat-bed-pattern/
